item.title: Welcome to Team Container: kick-off meeting
item.description: This group was set up to help researcher, research software engineers and IT Services staff discuss and demo how to do containers. The first meeting, held today, wasn’t widely advertised (sorry). item.title: About
item.description: Team Container is a meetup for researchers and research software engineers at the University of Sheffield with an interest in containers inc: Why bother - the value to reproducible research The nuts and bolts (cgroups, Linux namespaces, Linux capabilities, overlay filesystems) Container runtimes and image formats (Docker, Singularity, Podman, lxc) Image registries container orchestration (Docker Compose/Swarm, Hashicorp Nomad, Kubernetes) Best practices for building containers Security inc. managing secrets and audits We share our discussions via this site.
